thread.title: WATCH: Timberlake opens Oscars 2017 with 'Can't Stop the Feeling'
thread.title_full: WATCH: Timberlake opens Oscars 2017 with 'Can't Stop the Feeling'

author: Rappler.com
title: WATCH: Timberlake opens Oscars 2017 with 'Can't Stop the Feeling'
text:
Entertainment News WATCH: Timberlake opens Oscars 2017 with 'Can't Stop the Feeling' Justin Timberlake gets the Academy dancing as he opens the annual awards show with his hit 'Can't Stop the Feeling' Published 11:10 AM,   11:10 AM, February 27, 2017 'CAN'T STOP THE FEELING.' Justine Timberlake opens the Oscars 2017. Screengrab from Instagram/hbo_asia 
  Right before host Jimmy Kimmel took the stage at the Oscars 2017, Justin Timberlake opened the show with an upbeat performance of "Can't Stop the Feeling." #Oscars : @JTimberlake opens the show with 'Can't Stop the Feeling.' pic.twitter.com/Y3tOKUYZkh â€” Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 27, 2017 
Justin entered the Dolby Theatre   Manila) singing and dancing as his dancers, hidden among the audience, joined him from the aisles. 
The audience, including Justin's wife Jessica Biel, was on their feet and dancing to his hit feel-good song. 
"Can't Stop the Feeling" is nominated for Best Original Song in the 2017 Oscars. It was the theme song of the movie Trolls. 
Watch Justin's performance in the video above and let us know what you think
